title: Executive Order 9394-Amending Subdivision VII of Schedule A of the Civil Service Rules
content: By virtue of the authority vested in me by section 2 of the Civil Service Act (22 Stat. 403), Subdivision VII of Schedule A of the Civil Service Rules is hereby amended by adding thereto the following paragraph:
"10. Fourth-class postmasters in the Hawaiian Islands."
citation: Franklin D. Roosevelt, Executive Order 9394-Amending Subdivision VII of Schedule A of the Civil Service Rules Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/372367
